Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder
public class HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
The builder used to create new appnet identity networks based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder()

    HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder addAppnetDidServer​(java.lang.String serverUrl)
    Adds an appnet server URL that hosts DID REST API as specified by Hedera HCS DID method.

    Creates a new identity network for the given appnet.

    Defines the name of the appnet for identity network address book.

    Sets existing HCS Topic ID to be used for DID Document messages.

    Defines the memo for the DiD Topic.

    Sets the max fee for transactions.

    Defines the Hedera Network on which the identities and credentials are registered.

    Sets the key for topic submission.

    • HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public HcsIdentityNetwork execute​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client) throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.ReceiptStatusException, com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException, java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
      Creates a new identity network for the given appnet. This will initialize an address book file on Hedera File Service. Then DID and VC topics on Hedera network will be created unless already existing topics are provided.
      Parameters:
      client - Hedera client
      Returns:
      The new identity network.
      Throws:
      com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.ReceiptStatusException - in the event the receipt contains an error
      com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PrecheckStatusException - in the event the transaction isn't validated by the network
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - in the event the client fails to communicate with the network in a timely fashion

    • addAppnetDidServer

      public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder addAppnetDidServer​(java.lang.String serverUrl)
      Adds an appnet server URL that hosts DID REST API as specified by Hedera HCS DID method.
      Parameters:
      serverUrl - The URL to the appnet's server DID REST service.
      Returns:
      This identity network builder instance.

    • setAppnetName

      public HcsIdentityNetworkBuilder setAppnetName​(java.lang.String appnetName)
      Defines the name of the appnet for identity network address book.
      Parameters:
      appnetName - The name of the appnet.
      Returns:
      This identity network builder instance.
